description:
Keeping a private diary / journal has never been so easy. Momento helps you privately capture your daily activities, thoughts, ideas and photos, and combines them with your activity from social networks to create a complete and unified timeline of your life.

** Featured: Best New Apps / Designed for iOS 7 - 2013 **

Whether you already keep a journal, or like the idea but struggle to find the time, Momento can help make it quick, easy and rewarding.

With Momento in your pocket you can write your diary on the go, capturing moments throughout the day in the short spaces of time you find free. Tag memorable events, people you meet and places you visit for a fast and effective way to browse and search your moments. You can also create custom tags to categorise and keyword moments however you wish.

What really makes Momento shine is its unique ability to import and archive your online activity from popular web services and display it as part of your diary. In minutes Momento can create a searchable record of historic information and media that you have shared online — building a picture of what you were doing, where you were and what was of interest to you. Even if you're not interested in writing a private diary, this is a great way to record and look back on your day-to-day life.

All this amazing functionality is brought together in a beautiful, easy to use, award winning interface. Momento is quite simply the best way to record, recall and reflect on the memorable moments in your life.

Make every moment last with Momento.

** App Store "iPhone App of the Year" Runner-Up - 2011 **

- - - - - - - - - - - -
Essential features
- - - - - - - - - - - -

• Passcode and TouchID protection
• Full text search
• Attach photos
• Rate moments
• Tag people you meet
• Tag places you visit (GPS & Foursquare Places)
• Tag memorable events
• Create custom tags
• Reminders (Presets include dream journal, daily entry and daily photo)
• Share moments (email, message, Facebook and Twitter)
• Calendar view
• Landscape support
• Backup & restore
• Export as plain text
• Beautiful interface

- - - - - - - - - - - -
Supported Feeds
- - - - - - - - - - - -

• Facebook posts and photos
• Twitter tweets
• Instagram photos and video
• Swarm check-ins
• Moves places and activity
• Uber trip history
• Flickr photos
• YouTube videos
• Vimeo videos
• Last.fm loved tracks
• RSS/Atom web feeds

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
Awards & Notable Recognition
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

• App Store "iPhone App of the Year" Runner-Up - 2011
• iPhone App of the Week in UK, US, Ireland, Germany, Australia and New Zealand
• Starbucks 'Pick of the Week' in US
• Gizmodo’s 'App of the Day'
• O'Reilly’s 'Best iPhone Apps'
• Winner of 'Best Visual Design' in the Best App Ever Awards - 2009

“Momento Is Perhaps The Perfect Passive Diary App.” - TechCrunch
“I’m in love, and I can't believe it, but it's with a diary application.” - Macgasm
“Grab it fast before it's pulled off the App Store by Apple for too much awesomeness.” - Smoking Apples
“No app other than Momento is as inclusive and makes for such a content-rich timeline.” - rated 9/10 by AppStorm
